<!-- Generated by agents-reverse-engineer v1.1.0 -->

# types

Shared TypeScript type definitions for file discovery, exclusion tracking, and analysis result aggregation.

## Contents

- [`index.ts`](./index.ts): Exports `ExcludedFile` (`{ path: string, reason: string }`), `DiscoveryResult` (`{ files: string[], excluded: ExcludedFile[] }`), `DiscoveryStats` (`{ totalFiles: number, includedFiles: number, excludedFiles: number, exclusionReasons: Record<string, number> }`).

## Usage

Consumed by `src/discovery/walker.ts` (returns `DiscoveryResult`), `src/discovery/filters/index.ts` (populates `ExcludedFile[]`), `src/cli/discover.ts` (aggregates `DiscoveryStats`), `src/update/index.ts` (filters modified files), `src/orchestration/orchestrator.ts` (validates file lists).
